name: estimator
description: Calculates expectation values of quantum operators.

circuits.description: One or more parameterized or non-parameterized QuantumCircuit.

observables.description: The Hamiltonian to be evaluated. This is a list[tuple[str, float]].

parameters.description: The parameters to be bound. This can be either a list[float] or list[list[float]]].

value.description: Estimated expectation value. This is a numpy array.

variance.description: Variance of expectations. This is a numpy array.
